property.name: mediadisplayblurb
property.value: Afghan service members delivering prayer mats to a mosque

note.text: Observant Muslims pray five times a day at prescribed times. Even when on duty, your counterpart will likely break for prayer. Prayer can take place anywhere, not only in a mosque.
When possible, meetings should be planned to allow for prayer times. If counterparts interrupt a meeting to pray, be respectful and donâ€™t disturb them.
